issue.title: [CF 1628] Can't click through TMW icons
issue.body:
Greetings!

 

Updated TMW today, cant click through the bars\icons anymore (lmb\rmb hold to rotate camera).


> Posted by CurseForge user shayzam5555 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1628 | Raw

comments.body:
It's not TMW - it's the Loot Roll frame (the boxes that pop up when you can bonus roll something).

 

Use any UI overhaul addon you might be using or MoveAnything to drag it somewhere you don't care about until Blizzard decides to fix it.

 

E: Assuming it happens in the generalized area where your loot roll frame is. It's possible you do have this actual bug, but I'd check to see the position of your loot frame first.

Edited Dec 13, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
